surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
name of a river

sentences.english: Third, some practical measures for the pollution control of Qinhuai River were suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了防治秦淮河污染的具体对策。

sentences.english: Spring has not yet thought far Qinhuai-sur-air self-pity?
sentences.chinese: 春节未到思念远，秦淮河畔空自怜？
